text: Bar guizbangɨra, Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba bar aregha gɨfa. Guaratɨzir kamɨn, Ekiam Sirian mɨdorozir gumazibagh amima, me nɨgɨnir ekiam barasi, mati mɨdorozir gumazir avɨrim uan hoziaba ko karisba ko izi. Egha Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba ghaze, “Ia gan! Israelian atrivim ti Hitian atrivim ko Isipɨn atrivim givezezɨ, aning uan mɨdorozir gumaziba inigha e mɨsoghasa izi.” Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba kamaghɨn mɨkemegha, dɨkavigha zuamɨra danganim ategha arav ghue. Me uan averpeniba ko hoziaba, ko donkiba ataghizɨ da iti, egha me are. Me bizitam inigha ghuzir puvatɨ.
